title: Gold 3 serious player with 56% win rate looking for reliable duo.

embed.description: MandarinDubbed / Gold 3 49LP / 80W 64L Win Ratio 56% / Syndra - 67W 53L Win Ratio 56%, Leona - 11W 8L Win Ratio 58%, Lucian - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%, Ahri - 0W 3L Win Ratio 0%, Zed - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%

body:
I main syndra mid lane, and currently on a huge loss streak because my team is consistently much worse than theirs. I need a reliable duo partner for this seasons ranked to break this loss streak and reach my goal of diamond by the end of this season.
I rarely feed and usually consistently win lane. Please add me if you wanna duo.

replies.body: After checking the op.gg I would say that if you are truly serious at climbing I recommend watching NEACE's ["The Elo's Explained".](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8BtklaSWl0)

Hey there, i'm a thresh 1 trick, who has a 57% overall winrate. My op.GG is http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=lexythedeer add me, if you like. I've sent you a friend request. 

Started B2 this season, now Gold 4.
